title: Tony Fox (Australian rules footballer)
text:
Tony Fox (born 16 July 1958) is a former <a href="Australian%20rules%20football">Australian rules football</a>er who played with <a href="Western%20Bulldogs">Footscray</a> in the <a href="Australian%20Football%20League">Victorian Football League</a> (VFL). 
Notes.
 
External links.
